metadata.title: Are you a prisoner of the Digital Empire?
metadata.description: Assess your institution's level of digital dependence on Big Tech and discover your resistance profile.

q1.question: How much does your institution spend per year on software licenses?
q1.subtitle: Windows, Office, antivirus, specialized software...
q1.explanation: On average, a French high school spends between €30,000 and €60,000 per year on proprietary licenses. With free software, this cost could be reduced to almost zero, freeing up budgets for other educational projects.

q2.question: What will happen when Windows 10 is no longer supported (October 2025)?

options.a: We will have to buy new PCs for Windows 11
options.b: We can install Linux on old PCs
options.c: We will continue with Windows 10 without updates

q2.explanation: The end of Windows 10 support creates massive planned obsolescence. Linux allows thousands of perfectly functional computers to have a second life, avoiding enormous environmental and financial waste.

vercingetorix.name: Vercingetorix - Resistance Leader
vercingetorix.description: You are a true leader of the digital resistance! Your institution has already begun a transition to free software and you perfectly understand the stakes.

recommendations.0: Continue sharing your experience with other institutions
recommendations.1: Deepen your technical knowledge to further optimize your infrastructure
recommendations.2: Become a NIRD ambassador to inspire others to take the leap

guerrier.name: Free Software Warrior
guerrier.description: You are aware of the problems posed by Big Tech and you are starting to implement alternatives. Keep it up!

recommendations.0: Plan a gradual transition to free software
recommendations.1: Train teams on free tools to facilitate adoption
recommendations.2: Join NIRD communities to exchange best practices

asterix.name: Asterix - Resistance in the Making
asterix.description: You are starting to take an interest in free alternatives but your institution remains very dependent on Big Tech. Now is the time to act!

recommendations.0: Start with simple tools like LibreOffice or Firefox
recommendations.1: Raise awareness of digital sovereignty issues with your team
recommendations.2: Conduct a comprehensive audit of your dependencies on GAFAM

panoramix.name: Getafix - Apprentice Druid
panoramix.description: You are just discovering the issues of free digital. Don't panic, the druid Getafix will help you prepare the magic potion!

recommendations.0: Learn about free software and its benefits
recommendations.1: Test free alternatives on a workstation
recommendations.2: Participate in NIRD training to build skills
